r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n:
This is the GA release of the 2.2.2 SDK. It is a maitenance release with several fixes:
Changes: * PCBC-410: consolidate libcouchbase and extension loggers, and expose them through PHP logger * PCBC-409: bubble errors from server on view upsert * PCBC-417: do not send duplicated requests for multi-get * PCBC-423: report N1QL error details via logger * Documentation updates and bug fixes
